DOC.brief_summary: Background: Bone defects of the distal humerus require complex reconstructions, for which standard prostheses may be insufficient. The researchers therefore investigated the clinical and radiological outcome of elbow reconstructions by megaprostheses.
DOC.brief_title: Management of Bone Defects Around the Elbow
DOC.criteria: HMRS of the elbow, distal humerus or total humerus Unwillingness to participate
